title: Gluten free red velvet cake
ingredients: ['160g brown rice flour', '25g coconut flour', '100g sorghum flour', '100g tapioca flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon xanthan gum', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder, divided', '240ml rapeseed or vegetable oil', '300g caster sugar', '2 eggs, at room temperature', '185g unsweetened applesauce', '240ml buttermilk', '2 tablespoons red food colouring', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
